qas.question: Name two of the metropolitan areas that are enjoyed most frequently by tourist in Myanmar  ?
What are two of the top spiritual destination that Myanmar offers ?

answers.text: Mon State, Pindaya, Bago and Hpa-An

qas.question: Does Myanmar offer any destinations  that might be good for outside enthusiasts ?

answers.text: nature trails in Inle Lake, Kengtung, Putao, Pyin Oo Lwin

qas.question: Are there any edifice points of interest that may be of note to visitors of Burma?

answers.text: ancient cities such as Bagan and Mrauk-U; as well as beaches in Nabule, Ngapali, Ngwe-Saung, Mergui.

qas.question: Can visitors travel unrestricted through the country ?

answers.text: much of the country is off-limits to tourists

context: The most popular available tourist destinations in Myanmar include big cities such as <a0_0>Yangon and Mandalay<a0_0/>; religious sites in <a1_0>Mon State, Pindaya, Bago and Hpa-An<a1_0/>; <a2_0>nature trails in Inle Lake, Kengtung, Putao, Pyin Oo Lwin<a2_0/>; <a3_0>ancient cities such as Bagan and Mrauk-U; as well as beaches in Nabule, Ngapali, Ngwe-Saung, Mergui.<a3_0/> Nevertheless, <a4_0>much of the country is off-limits to tourists<a4_0/>, and interactions between foreigners and the people of Myanmar, particularly in the border regions, are subject to police scrutiny. They are not to discuss politics with foreigners, under penalty of imprisonment and, in 2001, the Myanmar Tourism Promotion Board issued an order for local officials to protect tourists and limit "unnecessary contact" between foreigners and ordinary Burmese people.
